article.title: Lockheed to Provide GPS On-Orbit Support
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Newton, Pa., is being awarded a $68,856,746 fixed-price, incentive-firm contract for Global Positioning Systems On-Orbit support. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Peterson Air Force Base, Colo.
